QuestData.Title: Team Spirit
QuestData.Description:
Even if we're competing against each other, we're all Maldraxxi. That means we cheer on everyone, regardless of which side they're on.
Enter the arena and douse the challengers with the contents of this flask. It may give them the edge they need to survive combat!
QuestData.LogDescription: Douse $1oa Arena Challengers with the Flask of Team Spirit.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice work firing up the combatants. They'll remember you helped them... if they survive.

Objectives.Objective: Arena Challengers splashed with Flask of Team Spirit
